1604066946_mirrored_DaniellMesquita_gith.body: Wakey wakey, I sorta need this now. Censorship in HongKong is getting bad, Would be nice to start seeing Darknet meshing Zeronet and other encrypted services over Cjdns on an ad-hoc wifi network with laptops and phones.
@HelloZeroNet Hi, could you link me to documentation about the bootstrap plugin? I couldn't find it in the ZeroDocs. Thanks!
